Package com.giift.sdk.ui.adapter

This package contains a list of adapters that can be used to feed the different list views

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ConversionsAdapter.MoveToPositionListener  
    ConversionsAdapter.OnItemClickListener  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CartItemAdapter
    Adapter that displays a list of CartItem and that allows manipulating those CartItem.
    ConversionsAdapter  
    CountryAdapter
    Adapter used to display a list of countries typically in a dropdown.
    CouponAdapter
    Adapter used to display a list of coupons.
    CursorRecyclerViewAdapter<VH extends RecyclerView.ViewHolder>
    Created by giift on 23/1/17.
    DmoAdapter
    Adapter displaying a list of Dmo, typically used in the brand index.
    LocationAdapter
    Adapter used to display a list of locations and the corresponding address.
    NavigationDrawerAdapter
    Adapter used to display a list of favorite cards in the navigation drawer: Favourites.COLUMN_ITEM_NAME Favourites.COLUMN_ITEM_IMAGE_PATH
    NewsAdapter
    Adapter, which will display the news in a list adapter.
    OrderAdapter
    Adapter that displays a list of Orders.
    OrderItemAdapter
    Adapter that displays a list of OrderItem, typically in an Order summary.
    PaymentProviderAdapter  
    ProductAdapter
    Adapter used to display a list of Products.
    TransactionAdapter
    Adapter used to display a list of transactions.
    WalletRecyclerAdapter
    Created by giift on 8/2/17.

Package com.giift.sdk.ui.adapter Description

This package contains a list of adapters that can be used to feed the different list views
